mn108:11.1: garuṁ karotha → garukarotha (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | garuṁ katvā → garukatvā (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn108:15.2: dhātā → dhatā (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | sātthaṁ, sabyañjanaṁ → sātthā sabyañjanā (bj, sya-all, km)
mn108:18.1: tirokuṭṭaṁ → tirokuḍḍaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | parimasati → parāmasati (mr)
mn108:24.2: maññati bhavaṁ senāpati → maññasi bhavaṁ senāpati (bj, mr); maññasi evaṁ senāpati (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
